text: Amores con trampa, is a Mexican telenovela produced by Emilio Larrosa for Televisa. It is the remake of the telenovela Somos los Carmona produced in 2013.The production of the telenovela began in November 2014. Itatí Cantoral, Ernesto Laguardia and Eduardo Yáñez star as the protagonists. == Synopsis == Amores con trampa, it is the life of a family of field that moves to the capital in search of a better future. == Cast == Actor Character Itatí Cantoral Isabel Mayer de Velasco Ernesto Laguardia Santiago Velasco Eduardo Yáñez Facundo Carmona África Zavala María Sánchez de Carmona Sofía Castro Nora Salinas Stephanie de Antunes Ignacio López Tarso Don Porfirio Carmona Luz María Aguilar Doña Perpetua de Sánchez Agustín Arana Lorenzo Joan Sebastian Himself Flor Martino Francisca Ballesteros Catalán Maribel Fernández Concepción "Conchita" José Eduardo Derbez Felipe Velasco Mayer Jocelín Zuckerman Alejandra Velasco Mayer Scarlet Dergal Rocío Velasco Rosita Pelayo Jessica Decote Carmen Gloria "Yoya" Carmona Sánchez Ceci Flores Susana Carmona Sánchez Aldo Guerra Alberto "Beto" Carmona Sánchez Rubén Lopez Jacinto Carmona Sánchez Harry Geithner Esteban Antunes Boris Duflos Diego Briseño Emilio Caballero Andres Briseño == References == == Other websites == * Category:Telenovelas by Televisa Category:2015 Mexican television series debuts
title: Amores con trampa
